subject: Order Tracking
description_text:
Hello,
My name is David and I have recently bought one of your products online.

I write to you because I wanted to check how was the shipment doing and I
couldn't check because it seems I need an order number.

I haven't received any mails saying my order name or even if it was
confirmed. I only know that I have already payed as I have the checkout in
my bank account.

Could you please look at my order and tell me the number so I can check the
shipment?

Thank you.

Sincerely,
David.

conversations.body_text: Hi David Fernandez Gonzalez,  Please provide the recipient’s information, order amount, order date, and destination country. Once the payment is successfully completed, we will ship orders in sequence according to the order timeline.

Hello there,  I send you guys a screenshot of the payment register.      My order was the Simsonn Pro X Ultra P2-H2 with baseplate. It costed 292.79€, it was ordered the day 3/1/2026 and it was destined to Spain, Barcelona, Barberà del Vallès Carrer del Pintor Goya nº50 1º1ª.     Thank you.
